extensionActivated: Coding Plans for Copilot extension activated
extensionDeactivated: Coding Plans for Copilot extension deactivated
welcomeTitle: Welcome to Coding Plans for Copilot! Configure a vendor profile and API key first.
inputBaseUrlPlaceholder: Leave empty to use the official endpoint
baseUrlInvalid: Base URL must be a valid http/https address.
vendorNotConfigured: No vendor is configured. Please open the config file and add one.
apiKeyInvalid: API Key is invalid or expired
setupModelTooltip: Set a valid {0} API Key and then refresh the model list.
setupModelResponse: No models are available for {0}. Set a valid API Key and refresh the model list.
noModelTooltip: {0} returned no available models. Check account permissions or try again later.
noModelResponse: {0} returned no available models. Check account permissions or try again later.
vendorNotConfiguredTooltip: No matching vendor is configured. Please configure coding-plans.vendors first.
vendorNotConfiguredResponse: No matching vendor is configured. Please configure coding-plans.vendors first.
vendorNotConfiguredMatch: Vendor "{0}" is not configured. Please configure coding-plans.vendors first.
unsupportedModelTooltip: {0} does not provide a model discovery API. This provider is currently unsupported.
unsupportedModelResponse: {0} does not provide a model discovery API. This provider is currently unsupported.
commitMessageSelectVendor: Select a vendor to generate the commit message
commitMessageSelectModel: Select a model to generate the commit message
commitMessageConfiguredModelNotFound: Configured commit message model is not available. Please select again.
commitMessageConfiguredVendorNotFound: Configured vendor '{0}' has no available models. Please select again.
commitMessageNoChanges: No staged or unstaged changes found.
commitMessageNoModel: No language model available. Please configure at least one AI provider.
commitMessageProgressGeneratingFromSumma: Generating commit message from structured summary...
commitMessageCopilotQuotaExceeded: Copilot chat quota exceeded. Please select a provider model configured by this extension (configure its API key first), or wait for quota to renew.
commitMessageSummaryFallback: Summary stage failed, falling back to single-stage generation: {0}
commitMessageValidationWarning: Generated commit message may not meet all rules: {0}
commitMessageDiffTooLarge: Diff is too large ({0} lines), truncated to {1} lines.
commitMessageNoGitRepo: No Git repository found in current workspace.
